item.title: Anthropic is lining up a new slate of investors, but the AI startup has ruled out Saudi Arabia - CNBC
item.description:
1. Anthropic is lining up a new slate of investors, but the AI startup has ruled out Saudi Arabia  CNBC
  2. Amazon Invests $2.75 Billion More in AI Startup Anthropic  The Wall Street Journal
  3. FTX estate selling majority stake in AI startup Anthropic for $884 million, with bulk going to UAE  CNBC
  4. FTX to Sell $884M of Anthropic Shares to Two Dozen Institutional Investors  CoinDesk
  5. Briefing: Abu Dhabi, Other Investors Buy Most of FTX's Anthropic Stake For $884 Million  The Information
